product_description: Intelligent Error Tracking Dashboard with AI-powered analysis
title: Preux v1.0.1 - Enhanced AI Analysis
description: Latest version of Preux with improved AI-powered error classification and enhanced database support.
keyFeatures: AI-Powered Error Classification using Gemma 3 270M IT model
Universal Database Support (Supabase, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, PlanetScale)
Multi-Framework SDKs (Flutter, React, Vue.js, Angular, Node.js, Python, Java, C#)
improvements: Enhanced AI model performance and accuracy
bugFixes: Fixed connection timeout issues with PostgreSQL
Resolved memory leak in error analysis engine
Fixed UI rendering issues on high-DPI displays
Corrected SDK generation for Python frameworks
